game.name: Yes, My Warlord
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 왕국 경영 RPG에서 호브고블린 장군으로서 군림하라. 자원을 관리하고 평민, 고블리노이드, 엘리트들의 변하는 의견을 조율하라. 어려운 결정을 내리고, 공정함으로… 혹은 잔혹함으로 통치할지를 선택하라.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rule as a hobgoblin warlord in this kingdom management RPG. Balance resources and manage the shifting opinions of commoners, goblinoids, and elites. Face difficult decisions, and choose whether to rule with fairness… or with brutality.
